line.originaltext: 3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened
line.annotation: create_ing(ing12, "3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened")

line.originaltext: 1 cup fat-free milk
1 cup egg substitute
1/4 teaspoon pepper
3 cups shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese
line.annotation: create_ing(ing16, "3 cups shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese")

line.originaltext: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
line.annotation: create_ing(ing17, "1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry")

line.originaltext: 1 cup frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained
line.annotation: create_ing(ing18, "1 cup frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained")

line.originaltext: 1 small onion, finely chopped
5 fresh mushrooms, sliced
In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese.
In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese.
Add milk, egg substitute and pepper; beat until smooth.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing14, ing15, ing21}, ing22, "mixture", "beat until smooth")

line.originaltext: Add milk, egg substitute and pepper; beat until smooth.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17, ing18, ing19, ing20, ing22}, ing23, "quiche mix", "stir")

line.originaltext: quiche pan coated with nonstick cooking spray.
quiche pan coated with nonstick cooking spray.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing24,"knife inserted in center comes out clean")
